definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)/assimilation

pinyin: yao4 wu4 dai4 xie4 dong4 li4 xue2
lao4 an1 suan1 dai4 xie4 bing4

sentences.english: VOICE: So it sounds as if anabolic steroids can be very destructive.
sentences.chinese: 所以，听起来合成代谢类固醇的破坏性会很大。

sentences.english: But this kind of catabolism mainly concentrates on the banana skin.
sentences.chinese: 而这种分解代谢主要集中在香蕉皮上。

sentences.english: These three factors have a lot of power over your metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 这三个方面就可以对你的代谢产生重要影响。

sentences.english: The changes of water sodium metabolism and the PGE2 were detected.
sentences.chinese: 检测两组水钠代谢和尿前列腺素PGE2的变化。

sentences.english: The Atkins Diet is a departure from the previously prevailingmetabolic theories.
sentences.chinese: 阿特金斯饮食偏离了以前流行的新陈代谢理论。

sentences.english: P-glycoprotein inhibited by Ver has no significant effect on PTS metabolism at the experiment conditions.
sentences.chinese: 糖蛋白抑制剂不影响PTS在实验条件下的代谢。

sentences.english: Their blood supply gone, fat cells are reabsorbed and metabolized.
sentences.chinese: 没有血供则脂肪细胞会被重吸收和代谢。

sentences.english: People with diabetes suffer from improper metabolism of sugar.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病人的糖代谢受到阻碍。

sentences.english: Coffee has several metabolic personalty that could dilute the hazard of concretion manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡具有几种可降低胆石形成的代谢作用。

sentences.english: RNA-binding proteins, metabolism and a new function for the genome?
sentences.chinese: 结合蛋白，是代谢和基因组的新功能吗？

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the effects of Xuezhiqing Capsule on the lipid metabolism in the hyperlipidemia rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察血脂清胶囊对高脂大鼠脂质代谢的影响。

sentences.english: All living matter undergoes a process of metabolism.
Improving saccharometabolism, reducing blood sugar, preventing and curing diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 改善糖类代谢，降血糖，防治糖尿病。

sentences.english: The supersession of the old by the new is a general, eternal and inviolable law of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 新陈代谢是宇宙间普遍的永远不可抵抗的规律。

sentences.english: They also help the body break down collagen in skin production.
sentences.chinese: 他们还有助于分解肌肤新陈代谢中产生的胶原质。

sentences.english: Their metabolism and the mechanism of anti-fatigue are elaborated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 其代谢与抗疲劳作用的机理在本文中进行了详细阐述。

definition: catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
to drain (factory waste etc)/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)/assimilation
to expel poison (from the system)/to detox
